history.proof: destruct (Rbar_lt_dec (Finite x) (Finite p_infty)) as [Hlt|Hnlt]. + split. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rbar_lt_le,Rle_refl,Rbar_lt_le_trans,Finite. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rle_refl,Rbar_lt_le,Rbar_le_lt_trans,Rbar_lt_le_trans,Finite. * scongruence use: Rbar_opp_involutive. * sfirstorder depth: 3. + strivial use: Rbar_opp_involutive.

exceptions.exn: No product even after head-reduction.

exceptions.tactic: apply Rbar_lt_le_trans with (y := Finite x); [apply Hlt1| apply Rbar_lt_le; apply Rle_refl].
exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : Rbar Hlt : Rbar_lt x p_infty Unable to unify "match ?M2295 with | Finite y => x <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end" with "Rbar_opp x = Rbar_opp y".

exceptions.tactic: apply Rbar_le_lt_trans with (y := Finite x); [apply Rbar_lt_le; apply Rle_refl|assumption].
exceptions.exn: In environment H2 : R -> Rbar H1 : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le y z -> Rbar_lt x z H0 : forall r : R, r <= r H : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le x y x, y : Rbar Hlt : x < 0 H3 : Rbar_opp x = Rbar_opp y Unable to unify "match ?M2667 with | Finite x => match ?M2669 with | Finite y => x < y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => False | m_infty => match ?M2669 with | m_infty => False | _ => True end end" with "x = y".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

y is already used.

In environment H3 : R -> Rbar H2 : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le y z -> Rbar_lt x z H1 : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_le x y -> Rbar_lt y z -> Rbar_lt x z H0 : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le x y H : forall r : R, r <= r x, y : Rbar Hnlt : x < 0 -> False H4 : Rbar_opp x = Rbar_opp y Unable to unify "(S ?M3708 <= ?M3707)%nat" with "x = y".
